title: Stopped receiving emails into my inboxes
content:
Hi All,

2 Days ago, I stopped receiving all emails into my 5 inboxes with Thunderbird on Windows 11 desktop.

Tried some troubleshhoting including updating to the latest version of Thunderbird version 128.7.1esr (64-bit) on desktop for Windows 11, and turning VPN off and on.

Would appreciate any troubleshooting ideas to get emails flowing again.

Thank you
creator: TC-7

title: Security Devices in Thunderbird on macOS
content:
On Thunderbird on macOS, I am trying to use a Security Device to client certificates made available by the OS for TLS authentication to IMAP servers and S/MIME signing and encryption. Under Security Devices, there is no Security Device that provides this functionality so in Security Devices I click Load and Browse... and select /Applications/Thunderbird.app/Contents/MacOS/libosclientcerts.dylib to add the appropriate security device. However, when I click okay, I get "Alert" "Unable to add module" . What am I doing wrong?

I also use libosclientcerts.dylib in Firefox just fine. Why is it not working in Thunderbird?
creator: rossmpersonal

title: thunderbird forgot accounts and local folders
content:
I tried restarting thunderbird after restoring from a backup (I had a disk issue). The profile is there in .thunderbird, with all the account information and local folders, but for some reason thunderbird can't find it. I tried deleting the cache, pointing the import wizard at a copy of the original profile -- all without any success. I can see the folders there with their data, and the account information. Why is thunderbird 128.6.0esr ignoring its data?

Thanks.
creator: mwc2

title: folders and contacts lost after update
content: My email account did an update and as a consequence I have lost all my folders and also all of my contacts in address book!! HELP. How do I fix this. I have already tried the profiles idea but to no avail. How do I get all of my folders that had all my emails sorted into them back and how do I get all my contacts in my address book back>?
creator: holmestead7

title: taking large memory space at launch
content: My Thunderbird is taking too much time at launch and using a heavy memory space resulting it to crash. I am using MacBook Pro.
creator: pallab1

title: E-posta Alım Sorunu Hakkında
content:
Merhaba,

Erse Tekstil bünyesinde bulunan ... kullanıcımız, ... adresinden gelen e-postaları Thunderbird uygulaması üzerinden görüntüleyememektedir. Gelen e-postalar web mail üzerinde sorunsuz bir şekilde görüntülenebilirken, Thunderbird’e yalnızca Erse Tekstil’den gelen e-postalar düşmektedir. Ancak Cellion Tekstil’den gelen e-postalar uygulamada görünmemektedir.

Bu durumun sebebinin belirlenmesi ve sorunun giderilmesi için gerekli kontrollerin yapılmasını rica ederiz. Konu hakkında desteklerinizi bekliyoruz.

Teşekkürler, İyi çalışmalar.
creator: lakakaersoy

title: Sent Folder
content: When displaying the sent folder the summary pane only shows my email address, but not the recipient. I wouuld like the pane to show the recipient.
creator: peter.d.atkin

title: Cambiar ubicación de la carpeta donde se guardan los mensajes de Thunderbird
content: Buenos días, Por alguna razón thunderbird está ocupando una parte enorme de mi sistema operativo MacOs, he comprado una ssd y quisiera saber cómo puedo hacer para cambiar la ubicación a esta ssd de la carpeta donde thunderbird almacena mis emails, cuentas de correo , etc... Podríais ayudarme?? Muchas gracias por adelantado. Un saludo
creator: nuria.eventseuropa

title: Remove Thunderbird complelty
content: I need to remove Thunderbird completely from my laptop and start again as though it was never there.
creator: colin31
